thread.title: Stanford Business School Seeks Review of Financial-Aid Policies

author: Kelsey Gee
title: Stanford Business School Seeks Review of Financial-Aid Policies

organizations.name: stanford business school seeks review of financial-aid policies stanford university

text:
Stanford Universityâ€™s Graduate School of Business commissioned an external review of its financial-aid policies after being criticized by some students for lack of transparency in its aid awards and for giving women and domestic M.B.A. candidates preferential treatment.
In a Wednesday email to students and staff reviewed by The Wall Street Journal, assistant dean of admissions Kirsten Moss said the business school also was creating a full-time position for an officer to oversee any changes to its aid policies. In the meantime,...
